overview: Patient-reported outcomes; Health-related quality of life; Health outcomes research; Cancer care delivery research; Comparative effectiveness research
research_interests:
His research interests are in Health Services and Outcomes Research among patients with urologic malignancies. His previous work has focused on health scale development, integration of quality of life assessment into clinical practice settings, and evaluation of variation and quality of cancer care.
  *
